name: EGLE
description:
Are snakes capable of love? Find out! Play EGLE, the visual novel with dating sim elements about dating serpents of Lithuania, one of them the serpent prince himself.

!Please don't choose Lygiažvynis, it's not working yet!

wasd and arrows for movement, zx for interaction

Full description:

Are snakes capable of love? Find out! Play EGLE, the visual novel with dating sim elements about dating serpents of Lithuania, one of them the serpent prince himself. Available in browser and on Game Buy cartridge… soon. Or not, because it’s a jam version and it will be redone from scratch anyway. The approximate audience in Lithuania is about 5 Game Boy owners, so this weird and somehow educational game will be (crowdsourcing) localization for the most Balto-Slavic languages.
